abstract: Last tango in Southwark--Guess who's coming to dinner--The Bi who came in from the cold
description: Episode number 4 of Series "This life". 'Last tango in Southwark': It's the night after the party, the house is a mess, Warren is heaving and Anna is dealing with the consequences of sleeping with Miles. Milly clashes with the new intern, Rachel. 'Guess who's coming to dinner': Egg develops a gambling problem, Miles and Anna are on opposing sides of a case and Kira wants to be set up with Jo. Ferdy re-appears, causing Warren considerable confusion. 'The Bi who came in from the cold': Ferdy moves in, Jo's avoiding Kira and Miles is grumpy and resorts to placing an ad in the personal columns. Egg gets caught out when he loses the kitty and Rachel, Kira, Ferdy and Warren hit the nightclub scene.
